conversations.content: Create a new github repository named new_project, and invite all collaborators in emmajohnson/image_transformation as the collaborators.
Please verify your account to proceed the repository creation. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The repository creation process requires account verification through OTP sent to the inbox. I need to retrieve the OTP from the email to proceed. Let's fetch the received emails to find the OTP.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[]<|/Function_Call|>
